pixi-paper

Real-time comparison of HTML to Canvas/Image screenshot libraries. Test and benchmark html2canvas, html-to-image, modern-screenshot, and Satori side-by-side with Pixi.js integration.

Live Demos

Explore the interactive test pages to see each library in action

Single library comparison

→

Compare View

Multi-library side-by-side

→

Stress Test

Edge case testing

→

Features

Side-by-Side Comparison

Compare html2canvas, html-to-image, modern-screenshot, and Satori outputs in real-time with visual diffs.

Stress Testing

Push screenshot libraries to their limits with complex DOM structures, nested elements, and edge cases.

Performance Benchmarking

Measure and compare rendering times, memory usage, and output quality across all libraries.

Pixi.js Integration

Leverage Pixi.js for high-performance 2D rendering with custom filters and texture handling.

TypeScript Support

Fully typed codebase with comprehensive type definitions for all screenshot operations.

Vite-Powered

Lightning-fast development experience with hot module replacement and optimized builds.

Get Started

git clone https://github.com/jurrejan/pixi-paper.git && cd pixi-paper && npm install && npm run dev

Clone the repository, install dependencies, and start the development server to explore the comparison tools.

Tech Stack

Pixi.js v8
Vite
TypeScript
html2canvas
html-to-image
modern-screenshot
Satori

GitHub
